name: Quaia_G20p5
reference: Quaia dataset (Gaia–unWISE quasar catalogue); dipole computed locally from provided FITS + random_10x
notes: sigma_dir from direction variation under |b| mask changes (20°,25°,30°); D_obs_err combines shot-noise + mask-variation std (20–30).
z_notes: Mean redshift computed from redshift_quaia for selected sky and magnitude cut.
